  • class hiro::modules::GraphResource

class hiro::modules::GraphResource¶

Overview¶

#include <GraphResource.h>

class GraphResource: public hiro::Resource {
public:
    // construction

    GraphResource(const std::string& name);

    // methods

    void SetData(const std::vector<float>& values_y);
    void SetData(const std::vector<glm::vec2>& values);
    const std::vector<glm::vec2>& GetData() const;
    virtual hiro::PGadget CreateGadget();
};

Inherited Members¶

public:
    // fields

    const hiro::ResourceId ID;

    // methods

    virtual hiro::PGadget CreateGadget() = 0;
    void ResetGadgets();
    virtual void Update(float delta_time);

protected:
    // methods

    void DrawOnNextUpdate() const;

Detailed Documentation¶

Methods¶

virtual hiro::PGadget CreateGadget()

Override this method to create custom Gadget type objects.
